title: Accessing the Jobs List
intro: Since Jobs are a key aspect of the FieldLogs platform, they are stored in the account of the User that creates them. Jobs created by a User are listed and available for viewing in the Jobs List on both the web and on the FieldLogs apps.

blocks.content: To access the Jobs List, simple navigate via the top menu of the FieldLogs website by selecting 'Jobs'.
Alternatively and if you have not done so already, you can follow through the Quickstart steps to familiarize yourself with the various screens and concepts of FieldLogs.com
On mobile devices, Jobs that were not created by the device or where the Job data alone has been deleted will need to download the Job data by tapping the dark arrow button on the right of the cell.

blocks.caption: The Jobs List on mobile devices have their own Tab/Menu item to which a User can navigate to view the Jobs List.
